events.message: The applicant submitted their mortgage loan application for purchasing a new house in May 2024, providing initial details and contact information.
The application was categorised under Mortgage Loan after review of property purchase intent and applicant’s financial background.
A mortgage loan officer specialized in residential properties was assigned to manage the application and guide the applicant through the process.
The initial review of the applicant’s submitted documents was conducted, focusing on income verification and property valuation.
Additional documents including recent bank statements, employment verification, and property appraisal reports were requested from the applicant.
The applicant promptly submitted the requested documents, including updated financial statements and a formal property appraisal.
The credit check was successfully completed, revealing a strong credit history with no recent delinquencies or defaults.
Risk assessment was carried out considering the applicant’s debt-to-income ratio, property location, and loan-to-value ratio.
A mortgage loan offer detailing interest rates, repayment schedule, and terms was presented to the applicant for consideration.
The applicant provided positive feedback on the offer and requested clarifications on early repayment options.
The application was escalated to senior underwriting due to the applicant’s request for customized repayment terms.
Following thorough evaluation and escalation, the mortgage loan was approved with favorable terms tailored to the applicant.
The approved loan amount was disbursed to the applicant's account to complete the purchase of the property.
A post-approval follow-up was conducted to ensure the applicant understands repayment milestones and has no immediate concerns.
The mortgage loan application process was officially closed after successful funding and initial applicant follow-up.
